name: Flappy Dragons - Quest of the Fire Bird
name_original: Flappy Dragons - Quest of the Fire Bird
description:
Game of Thrones Goes Flappy!
Flap your dragon between the towers and help Daenerys conquer all of Westeros!

Flappy Dragons is a parody of the hit game Flappy Bird but with a fun Game of Thrones twist!

Features:
▸ Simple and Addicting Gameplay
▸ Tap to Flap Your Way Between the Towers of Four Different Kingdoms including Essos, Westeros, and the Wall!
▸ Play with and Unlock New Swords and Dragons
▸ Share your High Score on Facebook and Twitter
▸ Retro 8-bit Rendered Graphics
▸ Game Center High Score Tracking
▸ FREE!




This app was not created or endorsed by "GEARS Studio", creators of "Flappy Bird" or "HBO" the creators of "Game of Thrones".
